sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Privacy.css'; const PrivacyPolicy = () => { return (

Privacy Policy

As CepGuid, we attach great importance to the privacy of our users. This privacy policy Collected during holiday reservations and other services you make through CepGuid It explains how personal information is used and protected.

Collection of Personal Information

When you visit our website, book a holiday, contact customer service or benefit from our other services, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, telephone number and address

Use of Information

The personal information we collect is used to fulfill your reservations, improve our services, support and customize user experience, communicate, and provide promotional and marketing offers

Sharing of Information

Your personal information is shared with third parties only for the purpose of providing our services or fulfilling our legal obligations. These parties include banks and other financial institutions to manage payment transactions and technology service providers to improve the quality of our service.

Data security

We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your collected personal information. These measures are designed to prevent data loss, misuse and unauthorized access.

Cookies

Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. For more information about cookiesOur Cookie Policy you can visit.

Privacy Policy Changes

We may update our privacy policy from time to time. Changes to the policy will be announced on this page and, if necessary, via e-mail.

); }; export default PrivacyPolicy;
